PAGE.NAME: 1a - Welcome

P.FONT: Welcome! My name is Ayla and I will guide you through applying for help from Utah Legal Services.
Click Begin to start.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
SET [Case Type TE] TO "S"
SET [Dopen DA] TO %%DATE(TODAY)%%
SET [Know TE] TO "W"
SET [Tintake TE] TO "W"
SET [LSCElig NU] TO "0"
SET [Fundsnum NU] TO "21"

PAGE.NAME: 1b1 - Name and Gender

P.FONT: Let's begin.
Please tell me your full legal name and answer the other questions below (questions in red are required).
If you are helping someone else apply for assistance, make sure you provide the information requested for the person with the legal problem.

PAGE.LEARN: What if I am assisting another person to complete this interview?

P.FONT: Although you are welcome to fill out the interview for someone else if you have all the required information, keep in mind that ULS cannot talk to you if you are not the person who is actually experiencing the problem.
We will need to speak directly to your family member, friend, neighbor or client to evaluate their situation and see whether there is anything we can do to help.

FIELD.LABEL: First Name:
FIELD.NAME: User First Name TE
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must type a response in the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: Middle Initial:
FIELD.NAME: User Middle Name TE
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must type a response in the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: Last Name:
FIELD.NAME: User Last Name TE
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must type a response in the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: Jr./Sr./etc.:
FIELD.NAME: User Name Suffix TE
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must type a response in the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: Gender
FIELD.NAME: User Gender
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: You must choose either male or female from the highlighted selection before you can continue.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
IF [User Gender]="Female" THEN
SET [User Sex] TO "F"
END IF
IF [User Gender]="Male" THEN
SET [User Sex] TO "M"
END IF

P.FONT: %%[User First Name TE]%%, is your legal problem in Utah?

BUTTON.NEXT: 1b3a - No Case in Utah-reside out of state
BUTTON.LABEL: No

NOTES.P: **zip code can just be collected with the address
** refer to lawhelp if not in Utah

PAGE.NAME: 1b Address

P.FONT: What is your mailing address?

If you are unsure which county to select, visit the National Association of Counties website. Find your county by entering the city in which you live or are having your legal problem. Click here if you have experienced domestic violence or abuse.

PAGE.LEARN: Which address should I use? Read this if you have experienced domestic violence.

P.FONT: If you have experienced domestic violence or abuse, make sure you give us a safe address. A safe address is an address where we can send you mail and the person who is abusing or threatening you will not see it. You may list the address of a trusted friend or relative, but make sure they are able and willing to quickly get you the mail.

FIELD.LABEL: Address:
FIELD.NAME: HOME_ADDRESS1
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must type a response in the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: City:
FIELD.NAME: HOME_CITY
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: You must type a response in the highlighted space before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: County:
FIELD.NAME: HOME_COUNTY
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: You must make a selection from the highlighted space before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: State:
FIELD.NAME: User State MC
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must make a selection from the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: Zip:
FIELD.NAME: User Zip Code NU
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: You must type a zip code in the highlighted space before you can continue.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
IF [HOME_COUNTY]="Salt Lake" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Davis" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Summit" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Tooele" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Other" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Grand" or [HOME_COUNTY]="San Juan" THEN
SET [Officenum NU] TO "1"
END IF
IF [HOME_COUNTY]="Weber" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Cache" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Morgan" [HOME_COUNTY]="Rich" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Box Elder" THEN
SET [Officenum NU] TO "3"
END IF
IF [HOME_COUNTY]="Wayne" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Piute" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Beaver" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Iron" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Garfield" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Washington" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Kane" THEN
SET [Officenum NU] TO "5"
END IF
IF [HOME_COUNTY]="Utah" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Wasatch" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Duchesne" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Daggett" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Uintah" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Carbon" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Sanpete" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Juab" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Millard" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Sevier" or [HOME_COUNTY]="Emery" THEN
SET [Officenum NU] TO "4"
END IF
IF hasanswered([HOME_ADDRESS2])=true THEN
SET [Caddress TE] TO %%[HOME_ADDRESS1]%% + ", " + %%[HOME_ADDRESS2]%%
ELSE
SET [Caddress TE] TO %%[HOME_ADDRESS1]%%
END IF
IF [HOME_COUNTY]="Other" THEN
GOTO '1b1 Other County'
END IF

PAGE.NAME: 1c - Citizenship

P.FONT: %%[User First Name TE]%%, tell us about your US citizenship or residency.

PAGE.LEARN: Why do you need this information?

P.FONT: We need to know information about your citizenship or immigration status so we know what help may be available for you.

FIELD.LABEL: I am a citizen of the United States
FIELD.NAME: Citizenship MC
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must choose a response from the highlighted selection before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: I am a permanent legal resident of the United States
FIELD.NAME: Citizenship MC
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must choose a response from the highlighted selection before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: None of the above
FIELD.NAME: Citizenship MC
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must choose a response from the highlighted selection before you can continue.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
IF [Citizenship MC]="citizen" THEN
SET [Citizencheck NU] TO 1
SET [Cstatus MC] TO "A"
END IF
IF [Citizenship MC]="pr" THEN
SET [Citizencheck NU] TO 1
SET [Cstatus MC] TO "B"
END IF
IF [Citizenship MC]="not a resident" THEN
SET [Citizencheck NU] TO 1
SET [Cstatus MC] TO "C"
END IF
SET [Citizen NU] TO %%[Citizencheck NU]%%
IF [Citizenship MC]="citizen" THEN
GOTO '1c1a - Citizenship-ss'
END IF
IF [Citizenship MC]="pr" THEN
GOTO '1c1b - Lawful Resident'
END IF
IF [Citizenship MC]="not a resident" THEN
GOTO '1c2 - Result of DV?'
END IF

NOTES.P: Radio options: citizen with a social ; citizen (no s.s. card); p.resident; none of the above
** add question to collect ss# or alien#

PAGE.NAME: 1c - Phone number

P.FONT: %%[User First Name TE]%%, what are the phone numbers where we may call you? We must have at least one number. You may list the number of a trusted friend or relative, but make sure they are able and willing to quickly relay messages from our office to you. Click here if you have experienced domestic violence or abuse.

PAGE.LEARN: What number should I use? Read this if there is abuse.

P.FONT: If you have experienced domestic violence or abuse, make sure you give us a safe number. A safe number is a number where we can call and the person who is abusing or threatening you will not answer or be able to hear your voice mail messages. You may list the number of a trusted friend or relative, but make sure they are able and willing to quickly give you messages from our office to you.

FIELD.LABEL: Amount: $
FIELD.NAME: Disability Income NU
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: A zero ($0.00) is not allowed here. If you do not have disability income select the "Back" arrow above until you reach the beginning of this section so that you can change your selections for income.

ELSE

END IF

PAGE.NAME: 1c1 - Hearing Contact - Urgent Problem

P.FONT: If you have an emergency or deadline and you need help right away, you CAN complete this online application.
BUT you should also call Utah Legal Services at %%[ULS Phone TE]%%, or contact a private attorney right away.
Otherwise, if you apply online, Utah Legal Services may not be able to look at your situation soon enough to help you with an emergency or deadline.

PAGE.LEARN: Can't I just apply here?

P.FONT: You can, BUT Utah Legal Services may not be able to look at your situation soon enough to help you.
If you have an emergency situation call Utah Legal Services or a private attorney right away.

BUTTON.NEXT: 1d1 - Hearing or Court Info - Urgent Problem
BUTTON.LABEL: Continue

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
//Example: set a flag if income too high
IF [NOTA211] = true THEN
GOTO '1f1a - Legal Problem p1'
END IF
IF [Court Papers TF]=false AND [Deadline TF]=false THEN
GOTO '1f1a - Legal Problem p1'
END IF

NOTES.P: **BEFORE conditions re county to determine what phone number to bring up. (See earlier questions for those phone numbers)

PAGE.NAME: 1b Submit Application for Review

P.FONT: Thank you for completing this interview. Click Send to finish and submit your application for review. Note that by clicking the Send button, you are verifing that all the information submitted is true and accurate.

After clicking send, you will then be taken to a webpage explaining how to contact us to finish the next steps in seeing whether we can help you. We will not contact you. You must contact us as described.

Remember: If you are using a public computer or any computer that does not belong to you, be sure to completely close out of the internet browser. If you don’t, you might accidentally share your personal information with someone else.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
IF [No Assets TF]=true THEN
SET [Asset1N TE] TO "No Assets"
END IF
SET [Notes TE] TO ""
SET [Summary TE] TO ""
SET [Notes1 TE] TO ""
SET [Notes2 TE] TO ""
SET [Notes3 TE] TO ""
IF HASANSWERED([Alien no TE])=true THEN
SET [Notes TE] TO [Notes TE] + "Alien #: " + [Alien no TE]
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([Court Info TE])=true THEN
SET [Notes TE] TO [Notes TE] + "; " + [Court Info TE]
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([Deadline date DA])=true THEN
SET [Notes TE] TO [Notes TE] + "; " + "Deadline Date: " + DATE([Deadline date DA])
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP_First_Name TE])=true or HASANSWERED([OP_Middle_Name TE])=true or HASANSWERED([OP_Name_Suffix TE])=true or HASANSWERED([OP Relationship TE])=true or HASANSWERED([OP DOB DA])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_ADDRESS1])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_ADDRESS2])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_CITY])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_COUNTY])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_STATE])=true or HASANSWERED([Other Party Zip])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "Add. OP Info: "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP_FIRST_NAME TE])=true or HASANSWERED([OP_Middle_Name TE])=true or HASANSWERED([OP_Name_Suffix TE]) THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "; " + "Full name: "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP_FIRST_NAME TE])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "; " + [OP_FIRST_NAME TE] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP_Middle_Name TE])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "; " + [OP_Middle_Name TE] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP_Last_Name TE])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "; " + [OP_LAST_NAME TE] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP_Name_Suffix TE])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "; " + [OP_NAME_Suffix TE] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP HOME_ADDRESS1])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_CITY])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_COUNTY])=true or HASANSWERED([OP HOME_STATE])=true or or HASANSWERED([Other Party Zip NU])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "Address: "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP HOME_ADDRESS1])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + [OP HOME_ADDRESS1] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP HOME_CITY])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + [OP HOME_CITY] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP HOME_COUNTY])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + [OP HOME_COUNTY] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP HOME_STATE])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + [OP HOME_STATE] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([Other Party Zip NU])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + [Other Party Zip NU] + " "
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP DOB DA])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "OP DOB: " + DATE([OP DOB DA])
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([OP Relationship TE])=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "OP Rel. w/ PC is " + [OP Relationship TE]
END IF
IF [More OPs TF]=true THEN
SET [Summary TE] TO [Summary TE] + "; " + "PC said more OPs"
END IF
IF [No Income TF]=true and HASANSWERED([No Income TE])=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + "No Inc. Explain: " + [No Income TE]
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + "Ind. Inc. Amts: "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income child support TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income Child Support TE]+ " $" + [Child Support NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income SSI TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income SSI TE]+ " $" + [SSI Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income disability TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income Disability TE]+ " $" + [DISABILITY INCOME NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income pension TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income Pension TE]+ " $" + [Pension Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income Workers Comp TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income Workers Comp TE]+ " $" + [Workers Comp Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income Veterans benefits TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income Veterans benefits TE]+ " $" + [Veterans benefits NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income self-employment TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income self-employment TE]+ " $" + [Self Employment Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income investment TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income investment TE]+ " $" + [Investment Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income alimony TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income alimony TE]+ " $" + [Alimony Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income social security TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income social security TE]+ " $" + [Social Security Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income employment TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income employment TE]+ " $" + [Employment Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income GA TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income GA TE]+ " $" + [GA Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income unemployment TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income unemployment TE]+ " $" + [Unemployment Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total Income NU]>0 and [Income other 2 TF]=true THEN
SET [Notes1 TE] TO [Notes1 TE] + [Income5N TE]+ " $" + [Other Income NU] + " "
END IF
IF [Total assets NU]>0 THEN
SET [Notes2 TE] TO [Notes2 TE] + "Ind. Asset Amts: "
END IF
IF [Total assets NU]>0 and [Non homestead property TF]=true THEN

P.FONT: DO include your partner if you are legally or common law married.
DO include minor children for which you are the parent or guardian and/or that you support.
DO NOT include any adult children living with you unless you have a legal responsibility to support them.
DO NOT include roommates.

PAGE.LEARN: What if I think I should qualify?

P.FONT: If you do think you should not have been denied, you may contact our office at %%[ULS Phone TE]%% between 9:00 am and 2:00 pm and be re-screened by one of our intake workers.
By completing this interview, you are only applying to see if you qualify financially for help.
Completing this interview does not mean that Utah Legal Services can accept your case. Utah Legal Services cannot assist everyone who applies for help.
You should not assume we will be able to help you.
Click Yes if you understand this and want to apply for help.
Click Exit if you do not wish to continue with your application.

PAGE.NAME: 1a Ask OPs

Be sure to tell us about the PRIMARY person, organization, government agency or business causing your problem.

P.FONT: For example, if you are having a problem with custody, be sure to list the child’s other parent and any other person or agency causing your problem. If you are having a problem with your housing, be sure to list your landlord and/or your housing authority and/or your management company.

ELSE

END IF

FIELD.NAME: Court TE

FIELD.NAME: Hearing DA
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must enter a date in the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.LABEL: Hearing Time
FIELD.NAME: Hearing Time TE
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must type a response in the highlighted field before you can continue.

FIELD.NAME: Papers Received DA
FIELD.INVALIDPROMPT: I need more information. You must enter a date in the highlighted field before you can continue.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
SET [One month ago DA] TO %%DATE(TODAY-30)%%

GOTO '1d2 - Deadline Info - Urgent Problem'
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([Case Number TE])=true THEN

ELSE
SET [Case Number TE] TO ""
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([Court TE])=true THEN
SET [Court Info TE] TO [Court Info TE] + "; " + "Court Name: " + [Court TE]
ELSE
SET [Court TE] TO ""
END IF

SET [Court Info TE] TO [Court Info TE] + "; " + "Hearing Date: " + DATE([Hearing DA])
ELSE
SET [Hearing DA] TO ""
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([Hearing Time TE])=true THEN
SET [Court Info TE] TO [Court Info TE] + "; " + "Hearing Time: " + [Hearing Time TE]
ELSE
SET [Hearing Time TE] TO ""
END IF
IF HASANSWERED([Papers Received DA])=true THEN
SET [Court Info TE] TO [Court Info TE] + "; " + "Date Papers Received: " + DATE([Papers Received DA])
ELSE
SET [Papers Received DA] TO ""
END IF

NOTES.P: This screen sets [Court Info TE] to any of the information answered on this screen. The fields are added to [Court Info TE] one at a time so there are no extraneous semicolons. Then [Court Info TE] is added to [Notes TE] in Question "71b Submit Application" to go into the database.

DO include your partner if you are legally or common law married.
DO include minor children for which you are the parent or guardian and/or that you support.
DO NOT include any adult children living with you unless you have a legal responsibility to support them.
DO NOT include roommates.

PAGE.NAME: 1a1b - Secure Site

P.FONT: Remember - your computer use can be monitored.
If you are not on a "safe" computer, please select Exit to end this program. You may return later from a safer computer.
Call 911 if you are in danger. You may also call:
*Utah Domestic Violence Link Line: 1-800-897-LINK (5465)
*National Domestic Violence Hotline: 1-800-799-SAFE (7233).

PAGE.LEARN: Where can I learn more about computer safety?

P.FONT: The Utah Domestic Violence Council has more information about computer safety at the following location: http://www.udvc.org/computersafety.htm.

PAGE.LEARN: Why do you need my social security number?

P.FONT: Your social security number is one way for us to find out if we are able to help you. Remember that this site is secure and your information will not be shared. However, if you do not want to give us your full social security number, you may choose to put only the last 4 digits of your social security number. If you give us only the last 4 digits, you will need to put 0's for the rest.

PAGE.NAME: 3 a Eligibility Calculations-Qualify(DV / Senior)

P.FONT: Total income entered: $%%[Total Income NU]%%
Total assets entered: $%%[Total Assets NU]%%
Based on what you entered for your income and assets, you may be eligible for legal assistance from Utah Legal Services.
Please select Continue to complete your application for assistance.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
IF [Senior NU] = "1" and [Problem Type MC] <> "37" THEN
SET [Fundsnum NU] TO "62"
END IF
SET [Asset1A NU] TO [Checking Asset NU] + [Savings Asset NU] + [Cash Asset NU]
SET [Asset2A NU] TO [Real Property Asset NU] + [Personal Property NU]
SET [Asset3A NU] TO [Second Vehicle NU] + [Recreational Vehicles NU]
SET [Asset4A NU] TO [Pension NU] + [Work Tools NU] + [Business NU]
SET [Asset5A NU] TO [Other Assets NU]
SET [Total Income NU] TO [Disability Income NU] + [Employment Income NU] + [GA Income NU] + [Alimony Income NU] + [Child Support NU] + [Veterans Benefits NU] + [Self Employment Income NU] + [Unemployment Income NU] + [Workers Comp Income NU] + [SSI Income NU] + [Social Security Income NU] + [Pension Income NU] + [Investment Income NU] + [Other Income NU]
IF [No Income TF]=true THEN
SET [Total Income NU] TO "0.00"
END IF
SET [Total Assets NU] TO [Checking Asset NU] + [Savings Asset NU] + [Cash Asset NU] + [Real Property Asset NU] + [Second Vehicle NU] + [Personal Property NU] + [Pension NU] + [Other Assets NU] + [Recreational Vehicles NU] + [Work Tools NU] + [Business NU]
IF [Total Served NU]=1 AND [Total Income NU]>=1134.42 OR [Total Served NU]=1 AND [Total Assets NU]>=11344.20 OR [Total Served NU]=2 AND [Total Income NU]>=1532.33 OR [Total Served NU]=2 AND [Total Assets NU]>=14323.30 OR [Total Served NU]=3 AND [Total Income NU]>=1930.25 OR [Total Served NU]=3 AND [Total Assets NU]>=19302.50 OR [Total Served NU]=4 AND [Total Income NU]>=2328.17 OR [Total Served NU]=4 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=5 AND [Total Income NU]>=2726.08 OR [Total Served NU]=5 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=6 AND [Total Income NU]>=3124.00 OR [Total Served NU]=6 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=7 AND [Total Income NU]>=3521.92 OR [Total Served NU]=7 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=8 AND [Total Income NU]>=3919.83 OR [Total Served NU]=8 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=9 AND [Total Income NU]>=4317.75 OR [Total Served NU]=9 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=10 AND [Total Income NU]>=4715.67 OR [Total Served NU]=10 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=11 AND [Total Income NU]>=5113.58 OR [Total Served NU]=11 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]>=12 AND [Total Income NU]>5511.50 OR [Total Served NU]>=12 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 THEN
SET [LSCElig NU] TO "0"
ELSE
SET [LSCElig NU] TO "1"
END IF

PAGE.NAME: 3 a Eligibility Calculations-Qualify

P.FONT: Total income entered: $%%[Total Income NU]%%
Total assets entered: $%%[Total Assets NU]%%
Based on what you entered for your income and assets, you may be eligible for legal assistance from Utah Legal Services.
Please select Continue to complete your application for assistance.

PAGE.SCRIPTS:
OnAfter
IF ([Domestic violence trigger TF] = "true" and [Problem Type MC] = "37" or ([Problem MC] = "DV" and [Problem Type MC] = "37") or [Senior NU] = "1" THEN
GOTO '3 a Eligibility Calculations-Qualify(DV / Senior)'
END IF
SET [Asset1A NU] TO [Checking Asset NU] + [Savings Asset NU] + [Cash Asset NU]
SET [Asset2A NU] TO [Real Property Asset NU] + [Personal Property NU]
SET [Asset3A NU] TO [Second Vehicle NU] + [Recreational Vehicles NU]
SET [Asset4A NU] TO [Pension NU] + [Work Tools NU] + [Business NU]
SET [Asset5A NU] TO [Other Assets NU]
SET [Total Income NU] TO [Disability Income NU] + [Employment Income NU] + [GA Income NU] + [Alimony Income NU] + [Child Support NU] + [Veterans Benefits NU] + [Self Employment Income NU] + [Unemployment Income NU] + [Workers Comp Income NU] + [SSI Income NU] + [Social Security Income NU] + [Pension Income NU] + [Investment Income NU] + [Other Income NU]
IF [No Income TF]=true THEN
SET [Total Income NU] TO "0.00"
END IF
SET [Total Assets NU] TO [Checking Asset NU] + [Savings Asset NU] + [Cash Asset NU] + [Real Property Asset NU] + [Second Vehicle NU] + [Personal Property NU] + [Pension NU] + [Other Assets NU] + [Recreational Vehicles NU] + [Work Tools NU] + [Business NU]
IF [Total Served NU]=1 AND [Total Income NU]>=1134.42 OR [Total Served NU]=1 AND [Total Assets NU]>=11344.20 OR [Total Served NU]=2 AND [Total Income NU]>=1532.33 OR [Total Served NU]=2 AND [Total Assets NU]>=14323.30 OR [Total Served NU]=3 AND [Total Income NU]>=1930.25 OR [Total Served NU]=3 AND [Total Assets NU]>=19302.50 OR [Total Served NU]=4 AND [Total Income NU]>=2328.17 OR [Total Served NU]=4 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=5 AND [Total Income NU]>=2726.08 OR [Total Served NU]=5 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=6 AND [Total Income NU]>=3124.00 OR [Total Served NU]=6 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=7 AND [Total Income NU]>=3521.92 OR [Total Served NU]=7 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=8 AND [Total Income NU]>=3919.83 OR [Total Served NU]=8 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=9 AND [Total Income NU]>=4317.75 OR [Total Served NU]=9 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=10 AND [Total Income NU]>=4715.67 OR [Total Served NU]=10 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]=11 AND [Total Income NU]>=5113.58 OR [Total Served NU]=11 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 OR [Total Served NU]>=12 AND [Total Income NU]>5511.50 OR [Total Served NU]>=12 AND [Total Assets NU]>=23281.70 THEN
GOTO '4 a Eligibility Calculations-Not Qualify'
END IF
SET [LSCElig NU] TO "1"

NOTES.P: If total served is greater than 12, and income or assets are greater than the amount allowed for 12, do we just refer them to call ULS?

P.FONT: You are leaving the interview and your answers will not be saved. If you have made a mistake select Go Back to continue this program.
If you want to leave select Exit to end this program and return to the Utah Legal Services website.

PAGE.NAME: 1f1c2 - No DV Family other than Salt Lake

P.FONT: Utah Legal Services cannot help with this problem. If your case is in Salt Lake County, Legal Aid Society of Salt Lake may be able to help. You may contact them and apply for their services on their website.
If your case is not in Salt Lake County, you may wish to view the following websites for more information about your problem:

B.U: Utah Court's Online Court Assistance Program

P.FONT: Select Exit to end this program and return to ULS' website.

PAGE.LEARN: What if I think I should qualify?

P.FONT: If you do think you should not have been denied, you may contact our office at %%[ULS Phone TE]%% between 9:00 am and 2:00 pm and be re-screened by one of our intake workers.

P.FONT: Use the name on your birth certificate unless it has been legally changed when you were married or by court order.

If you have experienced domestic violence or abuse, make sure you give us a safe address. A safe address is an address where we can send you mail and the person who is abusing or threatening you will not see it. You may list the address of a trusted friend or relative, but make sure they are able and willing to quickly get you the mail.

If you have experienced domestic violence or abuse, make sure you give us a safe number. A safe number is a number where we can call and the person who is abusing or threatening you will not answer or be able to hear your voice mail messages. You may list the number of a trusted friend or relative, but make sure they are able and willing to quickly give you messages from our office to you.
Gross refers to entire amount before any deductions.

If you have experienced domestic violence or abuse, make sure you give us a safe e-mail address. A safe e-mail address is an address where we can send messages and the person who is abusing or threatening you will not be able to read them.

*disability benefits,
*income from unemployment, employment or self employment,
*general assistance,
*alimony or child support,

PAGE.NAME: 1b - Items Needed to Complete Interview popup 2

P.FONT: Assets can include:
*the value of ALL you personal items such as TV's, computers, sofas, clothing, beds, etc.
*cash and money in bank or credit union accounts,
*a second home or other real estate,
*vehicles, cars, trucks or motorcyles,
